大事な公式戦の直前だって言うのに、\nどうしてわざわざ今、シリウスシュガーとバト:
Even though it's right before an important official match,
Why did I have to go out of my way to fight Sirius Sugaru right now?
しかも最終調整って、シミュレーターじゃなくて実機でしょ？\nあいつらがどうなって:
And by final adjustments, you mean the real thing, not the simulator, right?
No matter what happens to them, I don't know.
クララさん……も、もしかして心配してあげてるんですか？: Clara... A-Are you worried about her?
流石はカラフルブーケの誇るツンデレね。: That's the pride of a colorful bouquet, tsundere.
だ、誰がツンデレよ！ 私はただ、あいつらがケガして\n公式戦に出られなくなった時:
Wh-Who's a tsundere?! I'm just saying that they're injured
I'm just worried she'll complain when she's no longer able to participate in the official battle!
それは私たちが気にする事じゃないと思うわよ？: I don't think that's something we should worry about.
そうだな。私たちはただ、勝つ事だけに注力して突き進めばいい。: That's right. All we have to do is focus on winning and push forward.
シリウスシュガー……この短期間でお前たちがどれだけ成長したか、\nお手並み拝見と:
Sirius Sugaru... How much you've grown in such a short time
Let's see what you can do.
葵さん、なんだか楽しそうですねぇ。: Aoi-san looks like she's having fun.
フン……言っておくけど、私は正面から全力で叩き潰すから。\nあの子たちのために胸:
Hmph... Just so you know, I'm going to crush you head-on with all my might.
I won't lend you my breasts for those girls, after all.
ツンデレクララさんの言う通りよ。\nシリウスシュガーが相手でも気は抜かないでね。:
Miss Tsundere Clara's right.
Don't let your guard down when you're up against Sirius Sugaru.
だから違うってば！: I told you, that's not it!
模擬戦とはいえ、万が一でも負けたらウチの評価に響くんだから。: It may be a mock battle, but if we lose by any chance, it'll affect our reputation.
普段通りにやれば大丈夫。うるう、奇襲への備えは任せるわね。: We'll be fine as long as we do what we usually do. Ugh, I'll leave it to you to prepare for a surprise attack.
ぴぎゃぁ……あ、あんまり期待されると困りますぅ。\nわたし、プレッシャーには弱い:
Pigyah... D-Don't expect too much from me.
I'm the type who's weak to pressure...
お喋りはその辺にしておけ。模擬戦が始まるぞ。: Enough chit-chat. The mock battle is about to begin.
さあ、どこからでもかかってきなさい！: Now, come at me from anywhere!
前衛はラミちゃんと白奈ちゃんみたいね。: The vanguard looks like Rami-chan and Shirona-chan.
鳴滝と月ヶ瀬が後衛か……前回とは異なるようだな。\n各員、ブレイクコンタクトに注:
Narutaki and Tsukigase are the rear guard, huh? It looks different from last time.
Everyone, watch out for break contact――
い、いきなり襲い掛かってきましたよぉ！？: Th-They attacked us all of a sudden!
よし、まずは奇襲成功といったところか。: All right, let's call the surprise attack a success first.
シリウスシュガーのメンバーは俺の言葉を信頼して、\n忠実に作戦を実行してくれてい:
The members of Sirius Sugaru trusted my words
She's faithfully carrying out the operation.
だからこそ、このファーストヒットの意味は大きい。: That was why this first hit meant so much.
前回の敗因は、敵のペースに巻き込まれてしまったこと。: The cause of our defeat last time was getting caught up in the enemy's pace.
ですから、%usernameusernameuserna%さんが教えてくれた通り:
So, just like %usernameusernameuserna%-san told me,
Let's take the initiative first!
七彩を中心にシリウスシュガーが展開していく。\nこれも教えたとおりで、スムーズな:
Sirius Sugar deployed, with Shichika at the center.
This was just as I'd taught her, and her movements were smooth.
チッ……いきなり新戦術とはやってくれるな……！: Tch... What a new tactic to use all of a sudden...!
クララ！ 防御姿勢を崩すな！\n付け焼刃の戦術とはいえ、何をしてくるか分からない:
Clara! Stay on the defensive!
Even if it's a tacky tactic, I don't know what they'll do!
言われなくてもそのつもり！: You don't have to tell me! That's the plan!
葵さんとクララさんの勢いが落ちた？\nおそらくは、こちらの出方を窺おうと……:
Aoi-san and Clara-san lost their momentum?
They're probably trying to figure out what to do...
それなら好都合ですわ。ラミさん！ 白奈さん！\nそのまま正面から斬り合って差し上:
That would be convenient. Rami-san! Shirona-san!!
Keep fighting him head-on!
七彩の号令で、白奈とラミの機体が突っ込んでいく。: At Shichisai's command, Shirona's and Rami's machines charged forward.
なっ……！？ 足を止めて斬り合うつもりか！？: Wha...?! Are you going to stop and fight?!
あはは！ 余計な小細工しなくても、ラミ達の方が強いし！: Ahaha! You don't have to do any more tricks, Rami and the others are stronger!
ふぅん？ ちょっと操縦は上手くなったみたいね。\n――でも、考えなしの突撃なんて:
Hmm? Looks like you've gotten a little better at piloting.
—But wouldn't charging without thinking be a bad move?!
ちょっとばかしテクニックを磨いてきたところで、\n私の方がアンタ達よりもずっとず:
Just as I was polishing my stupid technique a little...
I'm way stronger than you guys!
さすがは歴戦のカラフルブーケといったところか。\n意表を突いた白奈とラミの強襲を:
I guess that's what you'd expect from a seasoned colorful bouquet.
She's firmly blocking Shirona's and Rami's surprise assault.
しかし、もちろん俺たちもそれは予想済みだ。: But of course, we had expected that too.
七彩とちゆるが、側面を見せた葵たちに射撃していく。\n致命傷にはならずとも、意識:
Shichika and Chiyuru fired at Aoi and the others, who had shown their sides.
Even if it's not a fatal wound, my consciousness should be dispersed.
くっ……！？ 遠くからチクチクと……！: Ugh...!? It stings from far away...!
さっきまでの威勢はどうしたのぉ？\nそんなんじゃラミにボッコボコにされちゃうよー:
What happened to your earlier vigor?
Rami's gonna beat me to a pulp like that!
ひとりじゃまともに戦えないくせに……！\n調子に乗ってんじゃないわよ！:
You can't fight properly on your own...!
Don't get cocky!
現状で、こちらと敵の戦力は拮抗しているように見える。\nよし、ここまではシナリオ:
Under the current circumstances, it looks like our forces and the enemy are competing.
All right, everything's going according to the scenario so far.
変だわ。鳴滝さんが後方にいるのもそうだけど、\n馬鹿正直に正面から斬りかかってき:
That's weird. Narutaki-san being in the back is the same, but...
It's the monotony of an idiot who came at me head-on...
そもそも、桃園さんはどこに……？: Where is Momozono-san in the first place...?
そうか！ これはおそらく、鳴滝さんたちの助攻撃をもって敵を拘束し、\n主力が側面:
I see! This is probably Narutaki-san's backup attack to restrain the enemy
The Iron Hammer and Iron Floor Tactic, flanked by the main force...!
ということは、姿の見えない桃園さんが――: Which means that the invisible Momozono-san――
ひとり前線を迂回するように潜んで展開していた\nめるの機体が、カラフルブーケの後:
He was alone, lurking and deploying to detour around the front lines.
The Meguru machine attacked the rearguard of the colorful bouquet!
大きく迂回しながら後衛へと進撃！\n教科書通りの戦術ね！:
We make a wide detour as we advance toward the rear guard!
It's a textbook tactic!
ひぃぃ～！ が、頑張ります～！\nここから先には行かせませんよぉ～！:
Eeeek! I-I'll do my best!
I won't let you go any further!
えぇっ！？ い、いきなり失速しましたぁ！？\nど、どうしたんですかぁ！？ もしか:
Whaaat?! I-I stalled all of a sudden?!
Wh-What's wrong?! Did you crash?!
……っ！？ いえ、これは違うわ！\n墜落しそうになっていると錯覚させるフェイク…:
...?! No, this isn't it!
A fake that makes me think I'm about to crash...!
今更気づいたところでもう遅いです！: It's too late to notice now!
な、あぁ！？ ごめんなさぁい、抜かれちゃいましたぁ！: Wh-What?! I'm sorry, it's been pulled out!
よし、成功しました！ 失速してからの急速方向転換！\nそして……これで後衛までの:
All right, it's a success! We'll change direction after stalling!
And now... the route to the rear guard is completely empty...!
このまま決めます！ いっけぇええええええ！: I'll make up my mind! Gooooooo!
知識としては知っていたけど、まさか実戦で……！: I knew it as knowledge, but it couldn't have been in real combat...!
低空の高速飛行中、それも戦闘機動中に\nあんな曲芸をやらかす命知らずがいるだなん:
In low-altitude, high-speed flight, and in the middle of a fighter plane.
I don't think there's a life-threatening person out there who could pull off such an acrobatics...!
っ、速い……！ ひとりじゃ無理ね……うるう！\nめるちゃんの迎撃を！ 挟撃するわ:
He's fast...! I can't do it alone... Shut up!
Mechan, intercept! We're going in for a pincer attack!
わ、分かりましたぁ！\nこれ以上好き勝手にはやらせませんよぉ！:
I-I understand!
I won't let you do as you please anymore!
